quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson
quotes.quote: The Lord's work has always been carried on by a relatively small number of people. It has never been otherwise.

quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson
quotes.quote: The Lord is hastening His work. This is your time.

quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
quotes.quote: Now, brethren and sisters, we have a great and solemn responsibility in reaching out to the millions of our Father's children across the earth.

quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson
quotes.quote: We need more missionaries! The field is white, all ready to harvest.

quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland
quotes.quote: The mission of the Church is to invite all to come unto Christ. This is the invitation to the world from The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
